resources.string: Our platform provides communication between the patient and the doctor, You will be able to choose the Suitable Doctor for Your Medical Case.
You will be able to choose the appropriate Doctor based on Standrads and Feedbacks that will indicate the quality of medical care
You can make appoiment for the examintion for Doctor
The patient will record a list of the drugs that are treated for the disease, including all the medical data (time, number of times a day, number of doses of the prescribed treatment).
We provide you a full recover for the Medical treatment operation which me it Easier.
